alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 3:43PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hendry and central Glades Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 342 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud near Lakeport, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Labelle, Moore Haven, Lakeport, Palmdale, Port La Belle, Brighton Seminole Reservation, Ortona and Lake Hicpochee. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE LIGHTNING...EXCESSIVE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This activity was also developing in an environment favorable for the formation of funnel clouds. Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio and local media for additional updates and possible warnings. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
